name: About
excerpt: The Offshore Journalism Toolkit is a project by Mario Tedeschini-Lalli and Nicolas Kayser-Bril, with help by Anne-Lise Bouyer, Pierre Romera and Defne Altiok. It was financed by Google's Digital News Initiative.
html:
The Offshore Journalism Toolkit is a project by Mario Tedeschini-Lalli and Nicolas Kayser-Bril, with help by Anne-Lise Bouyer, Pierre Romera and Defne Altiok. It was financed by Google's Digital News Initiative.

Contact us at contact@offshorejournalism.com
